L.a. Colors Hydrating Facial Mist, Rose Cbss665 (2020 formulation)

Brand: L.A. Colors

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: WATER (AQUA), PROPYLENE GLYCOL, PVP, ALOE BARBADENSIS LEAF EXTRACT, ROSA RUGOSA FLOWER EXTRACT, NIACINAMIDE, PHENOXYETHANOL, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, METHYLPARABEN, DISODIUM EDTA.

Ingredients: WATER (AQUA), PROPYLENE GLYCOL, PVP, ALOE BARBADENSIS LEAF EXTRACT, ROSA RUGOSA FLOWER EXTRACT, NIACINAMIDE, PHENOXYETHANOL, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, METHYLPARABEN, DISODIUM EDTA.

Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
